modelCorrections.rawOutput:
- Thought: To make the HTML accessible according to WCAG 2.1 guidelines, I need to add the "lang" attribute to the <html> tag to specify the language of the content.
- Observation: The extracted text from the website is in English, indicating that the content language is English.
- Action: Add [lang="en"] to the HTML.
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">
